nodes.text: Samus was a male Human Sith Lord and Sith Inquisitor who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War against the Galactic Republic. He resided in the Sith Academy on the planet Korriban, where he provided martial training for Sith Acolytes. Samus had pale skin, green eyes and whilst in the academy had a bald head and wore red and black robes.
One acolyte he trained, who was directed to him by Assistant Overseer Markan, went on to become the Sith apprentice of Darth Zash, and eventually became Darth Nox.

Samus first appeared in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, in which he played a part in the quest "A Fighting Chance". The quest was for the Sith Inquisitor class only and directed them to a class trainer, a role which Samus provided in the game.
